mapper.select:
select
,B_H2_020.shrid ,b1.b1kcmc ,tlr.realname tlr_realname ,tlr.username tlr_username ,shr.username shr_username ,shr.realname shr_realname ,B_H2_020.shrq, B_H_027.id gxid,B_H_027.SHMXID,B_H_027.SHDID, shr.USERNAME || ' ' || shr.REALNAME AS SHR, d009.ckh , d00901.kwh , b8.lsckid, b8.lskwid, b8.lscfwz,b8.sl from B_H_026 left join B_H_027 on B_H_026.id = B_H_027.lyid and B_H_027.zt = 1 and B_H_027.lylx = 1 left join B_H2_020 on B_H_027.shdid = B_H2_020.id AND B_H2_020.ZT = 2 left join t_user tlr on B_H_026.whrid = tlr.id left join t_user shr on B_H2_020.shrid = shr.id left join B_H2_02001 ON B_H2_02001.ID = B_H_027.SHMXID LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAINID,wm_concat(B_H2_0200101.CKMC || B_H2_0200101.KWH) as b1kcmc FROM B_H2_0200101 group by B_H2_0200101.MAINID) b1 ON B_H2_02001.id = b1.mainid left join b_h2_02001 b8 on B_H_027.shmxid=b8.id left join d_009 d009 on b8.lsckid=d009.id left join d_00901 d00901 on b8.lskwid=d00901.id
order by B_H_026.tlrq asc
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}
mapper.sql: B_H_026.ID, B_H_026.DPRTCODE, B_H_026.WHRBMID, B_H_026.WHRID, B_H_026.WHSJ, B_H_026.TLRQ, B_H_026.BJID, B_H_026.BJH, B_H_026.BJMC, B_H_026.PCH, B_H_026.XLH, B_H_026.TLSL, B_H_026.DW, B_H_026.SFKY, B_H_026.BJLY, B_H_026.FJZCH, B_H_026.SM, B_H_026.ZT, B_H_026.WCKCID, B_H_026.WLLB
mapper.select:
select
from B_H_026 left join B_H_027 on B_H_026.id = B_H_027.lyid where B_H_026.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and B_H_027.id is not null and B_H_027.lylx = 1 and B_H_026.zt = 1

select
,tlr.realname tlr_realname ,tlr.username tlr_username ,BH003.kcsl from B_H_026 left join t_user tlr on B_H_026.whrid = tlr.id left join B_H_003 BH003 on B_H_026.wckcid = BH003.id where B_H_026.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into B_H_026 (ID, DPRTCODE, WHRBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, TLRQ, BJID, BJH, BJMC, PCH, XLH, TLSL, DW, SFKY, BJLY, FJZCH, SM, ZT, WCKCID, WLLB) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tlrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tlsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfky,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bjly,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wckcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wllb,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

update B_H_026
DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRBMID = #{whrbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TLRQ = #{tlrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BJID = #{bjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BJH = #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BJMC = #{bjmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCH = #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XLH = #{xlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TLSL = #{tlsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DW = #{dw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFKY = #{sfky,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BJLY = #{bjly,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FJZCH = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SM = #{sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WCKCID = #{wckcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WLLB = #{wllb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_H_026 set DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRBMID = #{whrbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TLRQ = #{tlrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BJID = #{bjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJH = #{bjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJMC = #{bjmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCH = #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XLH = #{xlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TLSL = #{tlsl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DW = #{dw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFKY = #{sfky,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BJLY = #{bjly,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FJZCH = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SM = #{sm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WCKCID = #{wckcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WLLB = #{wllb,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
